titles: The science of herauldry, treated as a part of the civil law, and law of nations wherein reasons are given for its principles, and etymologies for its harder terms.
author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: Attributed to George Mackenzie. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Added t.p., engraved: Scotland's herauldrie / by Sr. George Mackenzie ...
"An alphabetical table ..." [i.e. index]: p. [1]-[5] at end.
Imperfect: Reel 696:31 lacks engraved t.p. and plate facing p. 95.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
